General.Name: Kisan Telecom Co. Ltd
General.Description: Kisan Telecom Co., Ltd provides distributed antenna systems (DAS) and Wi-Fi AP solutions in South Korea. It offers multi-band DAS for 5G and 4G, compact DAS, MCMB DAS, RF repeaters for 5G, and tri-band RF repeaters; tri-band AP, dual-band AP, access controllers, and Wi-Fi based backhauling systems; and FM/DMB RF repeaters for outdoor and indoor. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Kyu-Ho  Lee
1.Title: Managing Director and Chief of Laboratory
